description: Roof extensions to side roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: 	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: 	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those as described on the plans.

REASON: 	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(h), 1.2(f),(g), 2.1 and 2.10  of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2015).
